tables.table_title: The literature related to two-stage flowshop scheduling problems with $\operatorname{BPM}(\mathrm{s})$.
Illustration of the job sequence based representation.
The probability and accumulated probability of each job at position 1.
Simulation results under different combinations of $\alpha$ and $\beta$.
Results of the EDA and the $\mathrm{EDA}_{l s}$ for 100 job instances.
Results of the EDA and the $\mathrm{EDA}_{O_{2}}$ for 200 job instances.
Results of the EDA and the $\mathrm{EDA}_{O_{2}}$ for 300 job instances.
